content: pwsh (PowerShell) is the required shell environment
uv is the required Python runner and dependency manager
Always use pathlib.Path objects, never string manipulation for paths
Use runtime --allowed-paths injection, never static config files
Unix Philosophy: Small tools, text streams, flat files (TSV/YMJ)
Agents should be ephemeral (Temp Agency model), not long-running processes
User is the author of YMJ (YAML-Markdown-JSON) format
User is the author of SKG (Serverless Knowledge Graph) format
